tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ParentalSurvey (
  survey_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  parent_name VARCHAR(50),
  parent_email VARCHAR(100),
  survey_response TEXT,
  response_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ParentalInvolvement (
  parent_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  school_id INT,
  involvement_level INT,
  feedback TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE parent_survey_responses ( 
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
    parent_id INT NOT NULL, 
    question TEXT NOT NULL, 
    response TEXT NOT NULL 
)

CREATE TABLE parent_information ( 
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
    parent_id INT NOT NULL, 
    parent_name TEXT NOT NULL, 
    email TEXT NOT NULL 
)

CREATE TABLE school_analysis ( 
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
    school_id INT NOT NULL, 
    analysis_category TEXT NOT NULL, 
    analysis_result TEXT NOT NULL 
)

CREATE TABLE ParentalSurveys (
    survey_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    parent_id INT,
    survey_date DATE,
    satisfaction_level INT,
    feedback_text TEXT
);
